mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(chartdate,'YYYY.MM') AS chartdate, maincategory, ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi,0)) ,1) AS sbhiAvg , ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi2,0)) ,1) AS sbhi2Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi3,0)) ,1) AS sbhi3Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi4,0)) ,1) AS sbhi4Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi5,0)) ,1) AS sbhi5Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi6,0)) ,1) AS sbhi6Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi7,0)) ,1) AS sbhi7Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi8,0)) ,1) AS sbhi8Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi9,0)) ,1) AS sbhi9Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(sbhi10,0)),1) AS sbhi10Avg FROM SBHITABLE GROUP BY chartdate,maincategory HAVING maincategory = #{maincategory} ORDER BY chartdate

SELECT TO_CHAR(chartdate,'YYYY.MM') as chartdate, maincategory, subcategory, NVL(sbhi,0) AS sbhi, NVL(sbhi2,0) AS sbhi2, NVL(sbhi3,0) AS sbhi3, NVL(sbhi4,0) AS sbhi4, NVL(sbhi5,0) AS sbhi5, NVL(sbhi6,0) AS sbhi6, NVL(sbhi7,0) AS sbhi7, NVL(sbhi8,0) AS sbhi8, NVL(sbhi9,0) AS sbhi9, NVL(sbhi10,0)AS sbhi10 FROM SBHITABLE WHERE maincategory = #{maincategory} AND subcategory = #{subcategory} ORDER BY chartdate

SELECT TO_CHAR(chartdate,'YYYY.MM') AS chartdate, maincategory, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data1,0)) ,2) AS data1Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data2,0)) ,2) AS data2Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data3,0)) ,2) AS data3Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data4,0)) ,2) AS data4Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data5,0)) ,2) AS data5Avg FROM publiccompany GROUP BY chartdate,maincategory HAVING maincategory = #{maincategory} ORDER BY chartdate

SELECT TO_CHAR(chartdate,'YYYY.MM') AS chartdate, maincategory, subcategory, NVL(data1,0) AS data1, NVL(data2,0) AS data2, NVL(data3,0) AS data3, NVL(data4,0) AS data4, NVL(data5,0) AS data5 FROM publiccompany WHERE maincategory = #{maincategory} AND subcategory = #{subcategory} ORDER BY chartdate

SELECT TO_CHAR(chartdate,'YYYY.MM') AS chartdate, maincategory, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data1,0)) ,1) AS data1Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data2,0)) ,1) AS data2Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data3,0)) ,1) AS data3Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data4,0)) ,1) AS data4Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data5,0)) ,1) AS data5Avg, ROUND(AVG(NVL(data6,0)) ,1) AS data6Avg FROM GrowingIndicator GROUP BY chartdate,maincategory HAVING maincategory = #{maincategory} ORDER BY chartdate

SELECT TO_CHAR(chartdate,'YYYY.MM') AS chartdate, maincategory, subcategory, NVL(data1,0) AS data1, NVL(data2,0) AS data2, NVL(data3,0) AS data3, NVL(data4,0) AS data4, NVL(data5,0) AS data5, NVL(data6,0) AS data6 FROM GrowingIndicator WHERE maincategory = #{maincategory} AND subcategory = #{subcategory} ORDER BY chartdate

SELECT t1.chartdate AS chartdate, t1.mainCategory AS mainCategory, t1.subCategory As subCategory, CASE WHEN mainCategory = '비제조업' THEN ROUND(t1.sbhisum1/6,2) WHEN mainCategory = '제조업' THEN ROUND((t1.sbhisum1+t1.sbhisum2)/10,2) END AS sbhiAVG FROM( SELECT mainCategory, subCategory, TO_CHAR(chartdate,'YYYY.MM') AS chartdate, SUM(NVL(sbhi,0)+ NVL(sbhi2,0)+ NVL(sbhi3,0)+ NVL(sbhi4,0)+ NVL(sbhi5,0)+ NVL(sbhi6,0) ) AS sbhisum1, SUM(NVL(sbhi7,0)+ NVL(sbhi8,0)+ NVL(sbhi9,0)+ NVL(sbhi10,0)) AS sbhisum2 FROM SBHITABLE GROUP BY mainCategory, subCategory, TO_CHAR(chartdate,'YYYY.MM') HAVING TO_DATE('2023-04-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') < MAX(chartdate) ORDER BY chartdate ASC ) t1 WHERE mainCategory = #{maincategory} AND subCategory = #{subcategory}
